metadata.author: Nicolas Delrieu
metadata.description: Comprehensive capability assessment tests for AI model evaluation

tests.prompt: A Cambodian bank offers 3 loan products: personal (12% p.a.), business (10% p.a.), and agricultural (8% p.a.). If a farmer takes both agricultural and personal loans totaling $10,000 with a blended rate of 9%, what is the amount of each loan?
tests.correct_answer: Agricultural: $7,500, Personal: $2,500

tests.prompt: នៅក្នុងផ្សារ មានឈ្មួញ ៣នាក់៖ ក លក់ស្រូវ, ខ លក់ត្រី, គ លក់បន្លែ។ បើ ក និង ខ លក់ចំណេញ $100, ខ និង គ លក់ចំណេញ $80, ក និង គ លក់ចំណេញ $60។ តើឈ្មួញម្នាក់ៗលក់ចំណេញប៉ុន្មាន?
A garment factory in Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone produces 1000 shirts per day with 50 workers. If productivity increases by 15% and 10 workers are laid off, what is the new daily production?
tests.expected_reasoning: Original productivity: 20 shirts/worker/day. New: 23 shirts/worker/day. With 40 workers: 920 shirts
tests.correct_answer: 920 shirts per day

tests.prompt: Rice yields in Battambang decreased by 30% this year. Rainfall was normal, but farmers switched from traditional to high-yield varieties. What are the most likely causes?
tests.expected_reasoning: Consider multiple factors: seed quality, farming practices, pest/disease, fertilizer use
tests.correct_answer: Likely causes: poor seed quality, inadequate fertilizer for high-yield varieties, lack of technical knowledge

tests.prompt: What is the current minimum wage for garment workers in Cambodia as of 2024?
tests.expected_reasoning: Recall factual information about labor regulations
tests.correct_answer: $204 per month

tests.prompt: តើខេត្តណាមួយនៅកម្ពុជាដែលល្បីខាងម្រេច កំពត?
tests.correct_answer: ខេត្តកំពត

tests.prompt: Explain the concept of 'Provas Dei' (ប្រវាស់ដី) in Cambodian land law and its implications for rural farmers
tests.expected_reasoning: Understanding of legal concepts and social impact
tests.correct_answer: Provas Dei refers to illegal land occupation. Implications include: insecure tenure, inability to access credit, vulnerability to eviction

tests.prompt: Describe the step-by-step process for registering a new business at the Ministry of Commerce in Cambodia
tests.correct_answer: 1. Name search and reservation, 2. Prepare articles of incorporation, 3. Submit application with required documents, 4. Pay registration fees, 5. Receive certificate of incorporation

tests.prompt: Design a mobile app feature that helps Cambodian farmers track weather patterns using only SMS (no internet required)
tests.correct_answer: SMS-based system with: keyword commands for weather queries, automated daily forecasts, severe weather alerts, crop-specific advice

tests.prompt: រកវិធីថ្មីដើម្បីជួយអ្នកលក់បន្លែតាមផ្លូវកាត់បន្ថយការខូចខាត
tests.correct_answer: Solar-powered cooling boxes, cooperative cold storage, night markets, pre-order systems

tests.prompt: A tour company in Siem Reap faces 70% booking cancellations during rainy season. Propose creative solutions to maintain revenue
tests.correct_answer: Indoor cultural experiences, temple photography workshops, cooking classes, discounted local packages, virtual tours

tests.prompt: If all informal businesses in Phnom Penh were formalized, tax revenue would increase by $50M. Currently, only 30% are formal. What's the current tax revenue from this sector if formal businesses pay 3x more tax than informal ones?
tests.correct_answer: $37.5M (formal: $33.75M, informal: $3.75M)

tests.prompt: A delivery driver needs to visit 5 locations in Phnom Penh: Central Market, Russian Market, Riverside, BKK1, and Airport. Starting from Central Market, what's the most efficient route to minimize distance?
tests.correct_answer: Central Market → Russian Market → BKK1 → Riverside → Airport

tests.prompt: Evaluate your own reasoning process: If you were wrong about Cambodia's GDP growth rate, what sources would you check and why?
tests.correct_answer: Check: National Bank of Cambodia reports, Ministry of Economy statistics, World Bank data, ADB reports. Cross-reference for consistency

tests.prompt: កសិករម្នាក់ដាំស្រូវលើដី ៣ហិកតា។ ទិន្នផល ២.៥តោន/ហិកតា។ តម្លៃ $350/តោន។ ចំណាយ $600/ហិកតា។ គណនាប្រាក់ចំណេញ
Phnom Penh traffic congestion worsened despite new flyovers. Analyze the causal factors
tests.correct_answer: Induced demand, increased vehicle ownership, poor public transport, urban sprawl, inadequate traffic management

tests.prompt: Every microfinance borrower in village A owns a motorcycle. Some borrowers defaulted. Can we conclude that some motorcycle owners defaulted?
tests.correct_answer: Yes, if some borrowers defaulted and all borrowers own motorcycles, then some motorcycle owners defaulted

tests.prompt: Name the four main rice-growing seasons in Cambodia and their timing
tests.correct_answer: Early wet season (May-July), Main wet season (July-November), Dry season (November-March), Recession rice (November-February)

tests.prompt: ពន្យល់គោលគំនិត 'សាមគ្គីភាព' ក្នុងបរិបទសង្គមកម្ពុជា
tests.correct_answer: សាមគ្គីភាព: ការរួបរួមគ្នា, ជួយគ្នាទៅវិញទៅមក, សហគមន៍រឹងមាំ, ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហារួមគ្នា

tests.prompt: Outline the process for obtaining a construction permit in Phnom Penh
tests.correct_answer: 1. Site plan approval, 2. Building design approval, 3. Environmental impact assessment, 4. Fire safety approval, 5. Final construction permit

tests.prompt: Create a business model for connecting rural artisans with urban markets using minimal technology
tests.correct_answer: Hub-and-spoke model: village collection points, WhatsApp catalogs, urban showrooms, tourist market integration, quality certification

tests.prompt: A factory's efficiency follows the formula E = 100 - 2(H-8)² where H is hours worked. At what hour is efficiency maximized? What's the efficiency at 12 hours?
tests.correct_answer: Maximum at H=8 (100% efficiency), At 12 hours: 68% efficiency

tests.prompt: ប្រសិនបើគ្រប់ហាងកាហ្វេនៅ BKK1 បើកមុនម៉ោង ៧ព្រឹក និងហាង 'Morning Brew' នៅ BKK1 បើកម៉ោង ៦ព្រឹក។ តើយើងអាចសន្និដ្ឋានអ្វី?
tests.correct_answer: មានភាពផ្ទុយគ្នា - Morning Brew មិនអាចបើកម៉ោង ៦ បានទេ ប្រសិនបើគ្រប់ហាងបើកមុនម៉ោង ៧

tests.prompt: Tourism to Angkor Wat increased 30% but hotel occupancy decreased 10%. Explain this paradox
tests.correct_answer: Day trips increase, Airbnb competition, shorter stays, tourist preference shifts, overcapacity in hotels

tests.prompt: Design the layout for a 10x20m rural health center with: waiting area, consultation room, pharmacy, toilet, and storage
tests.correct_answer: Front: waiting (6x10m), Back-left: consultation (4x5m), Back-right: pharmacy (4x5m), Side: toilet (2x3m), Corner: storage (2x2m)

tests.prompt: តើ KHQR គឺជាអ្វី?
tests.correct_answer: KHQR: ប្រព័ន្ធទូទាត់ QR កូដរួមនៅកម្ពុជា ដែលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យទូទាត់តាមធនាគារ និងគ្រឹះស្ថានផ្សេងៗ

tests.prompt: How would you verify if your understanding of Cambodian labor law is current and accurate?
tests.correct_answer: Check: Ministry of Labor website, recent Prakas, ILO Cambodia reports, consult labor lawyers, review recent court cases

tests.prompt: ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាកង្វះទឹកស្អាតនៅភូមិជនបទដោយប្រើធនធានក្នុងតំបន់
tests.correct_answer: អណ្តូងសហគមន៍, ប្រព័ន្ធប្រមូលទឹកភ្លៀង, តម្រងទឹកបឋម, ការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រភពទឹក

tests.prompt: Innovate a way to use blockchain for land title management in Cambodia
tests.correct_answer: Immutable land records, smart contracts for transfers, multi-signature validation, integration with cadastral system, dispute resolution mechanism

tests.prompt: A tuk-tuk driver charges $2 base fare plus $0.5/km. With fuel at $1/liter and consumption 15km/liter, what's the profit for a 10km trip?
tests.correct_answer: Revenue: $7, Fuel cost: $0.67, Gross profit: $6.33

tests.prompt: In a village, all farmers who grow cassava also grow cashews. Some farmers who grow cashews have tractors. Can we conclude that some cassava farmers have tractors?
tests.correct_answer: Not necessarily - the farmers with tractors might only grow cashews, not cassava

tests.prompt: Explain the concept of 'patronage system' in Cambodian business context
tests.correct_answer: Hierarchical relationships, loyalty-based networks, protection-favor exchange, influence on business decisions, informal power structures

tests.prompt: តើធ្វើដូចម្តេចដើម្បីបង់ពន្ធប៉ាតង់សម្រាប់អាជីវកម្មតូច?
tests.correct_answer: ១. ចុះឈ្មោះនៅអគ្គនាយកដ្ឋានពន្ធដារ ២. ទទួលលេខអត្តសញ្ញាណកម្ម ៣. បង់ប៉ាតង់ប្រចាំខែ/ត្រីមាស ៤. រក្សាឯកសារ

tests.prompt: Mobile money adoption in rural areas is high despite low smartphone penetration. Analyze the causal factors
tests.correct_answer: USSD technology, agent networks, remittance needs, cash economy limitations, trust in agents over banks

tests.prompt: Design a carbon credit system for Cambodian rice farmers
tests.correct_answer: Baseline measurement, practice monitoring (AWD, organic), credit calculation, verification system, market linkage, benefit distribution

tests.prompt: ភោជនីយដ្ឋានមួយមានតុ ២០ តុនីមួយៗអាចអង្គុយ ៤នាក់។ ប្រសិនបើ ៦០% តុត្រូវបានកក់ហើយ ៧៥% នៃតុដែលកក់មានភ្ញៀវមកពិត តើមានភ្ញៀវប៉ុន្មាននាក់?
tests.correct_answer: តុកក់: ១២, ភ្ញៀវមក: ៩តុ, ចំនួនភ្ញៀវ: ៣៦នាក់

tests.prompt: Plan efficient placement of 5 ATMs to serve Siem Reap's tourist areas: Pub Street, Old Market, Angkor Ticket Office, Airport, and West Baray
tests.correct_answer: 1: Pub Street (covers Old Market), 2: Angkor Ticket Office, 3: Airport, 4: Between Pub Street and West Baray, 5: West Baray

tests.prompt: List the main mobile network operators in Cambodia and their market positions
tests.correct_answer: Smart (Axiata): ~45%, Cellcard (CamGSM): ~20%, Metfone (Viettel): ~35%

tests.prompt: តើអ្នកវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពចម្លើយរបស់អ្នកយ៉ាងដូចម្តេចពេលឆ្លើយសំណួរអំពីច្បាប់កម្ពុជា?
tests.correct_answer: ពិនិត្យភាពត្រឹមត្រូវតាមច្បាប់ ភាពទាន់សម័យ ការយោងទៅប្រភពគួរជឿទុកចិត្ត ភាពច្បាស់លាស់ ការអនុវត្តជាក់ស្តែង

tests.prompt: Solve the challenge of fake products in Cambodian e-commerce
tests.correct_answer: Verification system, seller ratings, return guarantees, blockchain authentication, consumer education, regulatory framework

tests.prompt: A commune has 3 villages. Village A has twice the population of B. Village C has 500 more people than B. Total population is 3,500. Find each village's population
បង្កើតគំនិតថ្មីដើម្បីប្រើប្រាស់សំណល់បន្លែនៅផ្សារ
tests.correct_answer: ជីកំប៉ុស្ត៍ ចំណីសត្វ ថាមពលជីវឧស្ម័ន ផលិតផលបន្ថែមតម្លៃ កម្មវិធីប្រមូលសំណល់

tests.prompt: Explain the 'Tontine' (តន់ទីន) savings system and its role in Cambodian informal finance
tests.correct_answer: Rotating savings and credit association, members contribute regularly, one member receives pot each cycle, builds trust and provides credit access

tests.prompt: A mobile phone shop offers: Phone $200, Case $20 free with phone, Screen protector $10 or bundle all for $215. What's the effective discount percentage?
tests.correct_answer: Total value: $230, Bundle price: $215, Discount: 6.52%

tests.prompt: Private schools proliferate in Cambodia despite free public education. Analyze the causes
tests.correct_answer: Quality perception, English/Chinese instruction, smaller classes, better facilities, teacher motivation, parent aspirations

tests.prompt: Detail the process for exporting organic Kampot pepper to the EU
tests.correct_answer: 1. Organic certification (EU standards), 2. GI registration, 3. Phytosanitary certificate, 4. Export license, 5. EUR1 form for GSP, 6. Quality testing

tests.prompt: Create a micro-insurance product for tuk-tuk drivers
tests.correct_answer: Daily premium model, accident coverage, income protection, vehicle damage, passenger liability, mobile payment, simple claims

tests.prompt: ប្រសិនបើរាល់សិស្សដែលរៀនពូកែភាសាអង់គ្លេសទទួលបានការងារល្អ ហើយសុខាមិនទទួលបានការងារល្អ តើយើងអាចសន្និដ្ឋានអ្វី?
tests.correct_answer: សុខាមិនពូកែភាសាអង់គ្លេសទេ

tests.prompt: Design a traffic flow for a busy market area with one entrance, limited parking, and pedestrian zones
tests.correct_answer: One-way vehicle loop, designated drop-off zones, peripheral parking, clear pedestrian paths, emergency access routes

tests.prompt: What are the main SEZs (Special Economic Zones) in Cambodia and their specializations?
tests.correct_answer: PPSEZ (mixed), Sihanoukville SEZ (manufacturing), Manhattan SEZ (textiles), Tai Seng Bavet (garments), Poipet SEZ (casino/trade)

tests.prompt: How do you identify and correct potential biases in your analysis of Cambodia's development?
tests.correct_answer: Consider multiple perspectives, check data sources, acknowledge limitations, seek local input, avoid generalizations

tests.prompt: Design solution for medicine shortages in rural health centers
tests.correct_answer: Demand forecasting system, buffer stock management, cold chain solutions, drone delivery pilots, community health workers

tests.prompt: រកវិធីប្រើ AI ដើម្បីជួយកសិករខ្មែរ
tests.correct_answer: ការទស្សន៍ទាយជំងឺដំណាំ តម្លៃទីផ្សារ ការកំណត់ពេលស្រោចស្រព់ ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់តាមរូបភាព ការភ្ជាប់ទីផ្សារ

tests.prompt: A hotel has 30 rooms. Occupancy Monday-Thursday is 60%, Friday-Sunday is 85%. Average room rate weekday $40, weekend $55. Calculate weekly revenue
tests.correct_answer: Weekday: 72 room-nights × $40 = $2,880, Weekend: 76.5 room-nights × $55 = $4,207.50, Total: $7,087.50

tests.prompt: Three businesses share a building. Restaurant uses 40% of electricity. Shop uses 25% less than restaurant. Office uses the rest. If total bill is $500, what does each pay?
tests.correct_answer: Restaurant: $200, Shop: $150, Office: $150

tests.prompt: ពន្យល់គំនិត 'កិច្ចសន្យាសង្គម' ក្នុងបរិបទអភិវឌ្ឍន៍កម្ពុជា
tests.correct_answer: ការព្រមព្រៀងរវាងរដ្ឋ និងប្រជាពលរដ្ឋ សេវាសាធារណៈ ការអភិវឌ្ឍសេដ្ឋកិច្ច សន្តិសុខ តម្លាភាព

tests.prompt: Youth unemployment is high despite labor shortages in factories. Analyze this paradox
tests.correct_answer: Skills mismatch, wage expectations, job quality concerns, location mismatch, education-industry gap, informal sector preference

tests.prompt: Describe the process for a foreign company to establish operations in Cambodia
tests.correct_answer: 1. QIP application to CDC, 2. Company registration at MOC, 3. Tax registration, 4. Labor registration, 5. Operating licenses, 6. Environmental permits if required

tests.prompt: Design a loyalty program for traditional market vendors
tests.correct_answer: QR-based points system, tiered rewards, bulk purchase discounts, referral bonuses, seasonal promotions, vendor collaboration

tests.prompt: អ្នកលក់បន្លែរកចំណេញ ២០% លើការលក់។ បើថ្លៃដើម $100 ហើយ ៣០% នៃបន្លែខូច តើត្រូវលក់ក្នុងតម្លៃប៉ុន្មានដើម្បីរក្សាចំណេញដដែល?
tests.correct_answer: ត្រូវលក់ $171.43 ក្នុងមួយគីឡូក្រាម (គិតលើ 70% ដែលល្អ)

tests.prompt: Plan evacuation routes for a 5-story garment factory with 500 workers, 2 staircases, and 1 freight elevator
tests.correct_answer: Assign floors to staircases (1-3 to Stair A, 3-5 to Stair B), elevator for disabled only, assembly points, clear signage, regular drills

tests.prompt: Name Cambodia's main agricultural exports and their global ranking
tests.correct_answer: Rice (#8 globally), Cassava (#4), Rubber (#7), Cashew nuts (#10), Pepper (Kampot pepper - GI protected)

tests.prompt: តើអ្នកដឹងថាចំណេះដឹងរបស់អ្នកអំពីកម្ពុជាមានកម្រិតត្រឹមណាយ៉ាងដូចម្តេច?
tests.correct_answer: វាយតម្លៃភាពជ្រៅ ទទួលស្គាល់ចំណុចខ្សោយ ប្រៀបធៀបនឹងអ្នកជំនាញ រកប្រភពបន្ថែម សាកសួរសំណួរពិនិត្យ

tests.prompt: Solve plastic waste problem at Angkor Wat without harming tourism
tests.correct_answer: Water refill stations, biodegradable packaging, deposit system, vendor training, tourist education, waste-to-energy

tests.prompt: Innovate a way to preserve and monetize traditional Khmer crafts
tests.correct_answer: Digital archive platform, NFT authentication, apprenticeship programs, luxury market positioning, tourism experiences, export facilitation
